title: [LFM] Looking for a Mid Laner
body:
Nesting Blue are looking for a mid laner!

Must have good communication.

Needs to be available straight away.

Must have good knowledge of matchups and synergies.

Must know when to roam and when not to.

 --------------------------------

Current Rank:

Highest Rank Achieved:

Top 5 Mid Champs:

What do you want from a team:

Rank 5s Experience:

Please leave your answers in the comments

replies.body:
Current Rank: Gold 4

Highest Rank Achieved: Gold 1

Top 5 Mid Champs:  Ezreal, Zed, Katarina, Twisted Fate, Viktor

What do you want from a team: A Serious team which do not blame each other for mistakes and can work cooperatively 

Rank 5s Experience: had a few ranked 5s teams in the past none of these worked out due to people quitting league or just losing interest,

Hey, I'm also looking for a team 

Plat V
Plat V
Kennen, Zed, Cho, Annie, Kayle
I'm looking to see the game from a broader perspective, utilizing comms ect to play the game as 5 people opposed to solo mentality
as i believe this helps you improve fastest.
I have pretty limited experience just playing on a few different teams with friends/randoms

Keen to start ASAP

Add my account Judge Dredd im looking for a team that needs a mid laner i have been trying to expand my champion pool by practicing control mages and ganking with jungler alot early game. I just starting playing so this is my first season but i have adapted to the game quite well. I am a chill player who doesnt like people who rage at their team mates.



Current Rank: B2 first season

Highest Rank Achieved: B2

Top 5 Mid Champs {{champion:4}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:245}} 

What do you want from a team: Good team comp chill players and heaps of wins

Rank 5s Experience: Have played decent amount of 5s

Current Rank: G5

Highest Rank Achieved: G5 

Top 5 Mid Champs: TF/YASUO/ZED/FIZZ/KAT
Best mid would be: TF

What do you want from a team: I want good communication in a team such as using skype or TS, good team work and values.

Rank 5s Experience: Done a couple rank 5's with people before but we didn't have any sort of communication such as skype or TS.

Heyas,

Questions about the team :
- What is the average solo queue rank of your members ?
- Where do you guys live / what is the time zones you're on

My info :
Ingame Name : Katalize

Current Rank: G3
Highest Rank Achieved: G1

Top 5 Mid Champs:
Currently playing a lot : Brand / Veigar / Kayle / Cassio / Velkoz 
Highly skilled on : Elise / Fizz / TF / katarina / LB / Zed

What do you want from a team:
I value team spirit, working on our mutual flaws together.
I expect my team members to be open to criticism as much as I am. 
I am not a leader type, yet I expect to be able to give advice and strategic opinions, while being heard out.
I am looking to learn from other experienced and motivated players. 

Rank 5s Experience:
I have played in a 5 teams in season 3, Australian player base on NA server. I was the mid laner and our compositions relied on CC / AOE such as Galio / Cho gath / Kennen / Vlad mid picks.
I haven't played in 5's ranked since then, mainly in 3s on Twisted treeline and solo/ duo queue on SR.

I'm interested in trying out for you guys, message me in game !

Cheers,
